name: CGVector
desc: A structure that contains a two-dimensional vector.

items.name: static var zero: CGVector
items.desc: The vector whose components are both zero.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates a vector whose components are both zero.

items.name: var dx: CGFloat
items.desc: The x component of the vector.

items.name: var dy: CGFloat
items.desc: The y component of the vector.

items.name: init(dx: Double, dy: Double)
items.desc: Creates a vector with components specified as floating-point values.

items.name: init(dx: CGFloat, dy: CGFloat)
items.desc: Creates a vector with components specified as CGFloat values.

items.name: init(dx: Int, dy: Int)
items.desc: Creates a vector with components specified as integer values.
